gist.summary: The Discord announcement workflow now supports manual triggers and processes PRs faster by utilizing titles and descriptions instead of raw code diffs.
gist.impact: Maintainers can now easily retry failed announcements, and the system uses fewer API resources while generating more focused updates.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot tuning a small, friendly robot with a wrench. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixelated gears and tools. Nostalgic but beautiful.
